BackstoryDef.title: Wandering bard
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a bard living out of performances.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] could always be found telling stories or singing songs, and is capable of protecting [PAWN_objective]self from the dangers of the road.

BackstoryDef.title: ruins explorer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was tasked with watching [PAWN_possessive] family's herds, but often shirked [PAWN_possessive] duties to go exploring the abandoned ruins scattered across the land.

BackstoryDef.title: academic
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] did studies in various subjects at a university.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] spent much of [PAWN_possessive] spare time in a nearby archery range, though [PAWN_pronoun] was frequently ridiculed by others for [PAWN_possessive] terrible aim.

BackstoryDef.title: pirate
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of the piracy tradition, extorting and smashing peaceful trade ships for profit in faraway seas.

BackstoryDef.title: furniture builder
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up near forests. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] time building beautiful furniture for wealthy clients.
